content.description:
Directions: You will now hear several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of questions based on the content. Select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.

NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

choices.label: Sie sammeln alle Details über den Fundort.
Sie benutzen nur die modernsten Maschinen.
Sie arbeiten am liebsten in einem Team.

content.answer: Sie sammeln alle Details über den Fundort.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
